tiers.name: Nutrition I
tiers.description: Increases the number of food points the apple restores

tiers.name: Saturation I
tiers.description: Increases the saturation of the apple

tiers.name: Eat Speed I
tiers.description: Increases how fast you can eat the apple

tiers.name: Durability I
tiers.description: Increases the durability of the apple

tiers.name: Eat Speed II
tiers.description: Increases how fast you can eat the apple

tiers.name: Durability II
tiers.description: Increases the durability of the apple

tiers.name: Auto Repair
tiers.description: Automatically repairs your apple over time!

tiers.name: Always Edible
tiers.description: You can eat the apple even when you are full!

tiers.name: Infinite Nutrition
tiers.description: Put as many points into nutrition as you want

tiers.name: Infinite Saturation

tiers.name: Infinite Eat Speed
tiers.description: Put as many points into eat speed as you want (only up to 7 points will do anything)

tiers.description: Put as many points into durability as you want
